pullrequest.title: qtutils 2.0.0 support and experimental PyQt5 support

content.raw: Are you sure that's not labscript_devices importing PyQt5 when BLACS is PyQt4? Since they both are imported in the same interpreter that would definitely cause issues. I've been seeing that - goes away if I switch labscript_devices back to PyQt4 as well.
content.html: Are you sure that's not labscript_devices importing PyQt5 when BLACS is PyQt4? Since they both are imported in the same interpreter that would definitely cause issues. I've been seeing that - goes away if I switch labscript_devices back to PyQt4 as well.
